abstracts.cdata!:
In support of broad-based economic
            growth, the Eritrea Power Distribution and Rural
            Electrification Project aims to: (a) establish a sustainable
            program for expanding the population's access to
            electricity; and (b) improve the quality and reliability of
            electricity supply. To meet these objectives, the project
            will help finance three components: (1) the rehabilitation
            and expansion of the Asmara city distribution system; (2) a
            rural electrification program; and (3) a program for power
            sector reform and the building of  related institutional
            capacity to increase efficiency and attract private participation.
